CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT(CYCLE_ID__r.Contact.Is_Infertility_Due_to_Male_Factors__c) = "Yes" ||TEXT(CYCLE_ID__r.CI_MALE__c) = "y = Yes" && PARENT_SEX__c = "1" && (CYCLE_TYPE__c = "1" || CYCLE_TYPE__c = "3" || CYCLE_TYPE__c = "4" ||CYCLE_TYPE__c = "5" || CYCLE_TYPE__c = "6" || CYCLE_TYPE__c = "7"), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(CYCLE_ID__r.MALE_DIAG__c))), LEFT(TEXT(CYCLE_ID__r.MALE_DIAG__c), 1), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(CYCLE_ID__r.Contact.Which_Male_Infertility_Factors__c))), ( CASE( TEXT(CYCLE_ID__r.Contact.Which_Male_Infertility_Factors__c), "Idiopathic (Unexplained)", "1", "Genetic (Klinefelterâ€™s)", "2", "Genetic (Y Deletion)", "3", "Genetic (Other)", "4", "Testis Damage (Cancer Treatment)", "5", "Testis Damage - Other (incl. past/recent cryptorchidism, vascular, infective,", "6", "Gonadotrophin Deficiency", "7", "Vasectomy", "8", "Congenital Absence of the Vas Deferens/Cystic Fibrosis", "9", "Obstructive Disorder (other)", "10", "Erectile Dysfunction", "11", "Ejaculatory Disorders (eg. Spinal Injury, Retrograde, Anejaculation)", "12", "0" ) ), NULL ) ), NULL )
CustomField.label: MALE_DIAG
